title: Fix your stuff rito!!!! CLIENT FREEZE
body: So "recently" I mean everyday I want to play league during champ select the league client freezes. It is not only me but it is my friends as well. This is super annoying and out of our control. We get penalized for it and have to wait for q times due to the fact that riot cannot fix their shit. This is super annoying and needs to be addressed{{champion:17}}

replies.body: There's been a issue for some players crashing while using third party programs.  If you have any apps like play.tv or overwolf, disable them and try again.  You can also test it out in custom games to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if your issue persists!

same thing still happens and its super annoying. i never use 3rd party programs and due to the league client i have lost tons of lp and its super annoying. i have even tried to reinstall league and the same thing happens. Its definitely not on my side.

Another culprit to this is with a recent Windows 10 update, where the Xbox game bar is not interacting well with League.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), even if you don't have it running it kind of forces itself on when the game loads.  

If you continue to have issues, go over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to fix any outdated driver, game file, or hardware issues.  Hopefully, these will get you fixed up!
